title: Is there a good reason for the high MS in league?
body: Not movement speed, I mean ping. I get a cool 14-19ms in Overwatch, shit is tight. However in league I'm at an awkward and uncomfortable 72-80. That may not seem terrible to you but everything is a hair-trigger in this game. So serious question, is this normal for Riots servers? Its pretty janky if it is. Probably won't be seen anymore since I had to move it to this section.

replies.body: If you are getting sudden high ping like this then you could be having packet loss.  This can happen if your ISP or network is having problems holding comms with the game server.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview and find out what's going on.  Let me know what you find.

http://imgur.com/a/JL97i 
These are the results, I have no package lost and only had one spike that lasted about a few seconds. I have a wifi extender in my room that I am plugged into directly. I have seen improvements in all aspects when it comes to gaming, downloading, and streaming. League is the only thing I have not seen improvements on. I bought the extender specifically for League. Any tips would be greatly appreciated.
